sources.title: The Ghost
sources.description: Title: The Ghost Summary: A woman and her lover murder her husband, a doctor. Soon, however, strange things start happening, and they wonder if they really killed him, or if he is coming back from the dead to haunt them. Directed by: Riccardo Freda Actors: Barbara Steele, Peter Baldwin, Elio Jotta Production Company: Panda Societa per L'Industria Cinematografica Release Date: 30 March 1963 (Italy) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 A woman and her lover murder her husband, a doctor. Soon, however, strange things start happening, and they wonder if they really killed him, or if he is coming back from the dead to haunt them.

metadata.Plot: A woman and her lover murder her doctor husband, but when strange things start happening, they wonder if they really killed him, or if he has come back from the dead to haunt them.
metadata.Actors: Barbara Steele, Peter Baldwin, Elio Jotta
